commit_message: small fix for FCS GX script

clarified one of the functions of GAP_dgenies_prep

I simplified the GAP_purge_haplotigs_SR script to remove the QC step at the end. This helps remove some of the computational overhead that can largely be avoided if the assembly is already chromosome-scale
added an example script for tblastn
modifying the existing purge_haplotigs pipeline to work with long reads only
updating wildcards of GAP_phase to allow periods and underscores in sequence names
working on getting GAP_phase back up to date
stripping chars at the beginning and end

the index files for JBAT are too big. made them temporary

updating hicmap5 seems to be working
adding a new hic_map script to use the faster aligner, chromap
adding a script from hicassembly tools
cutoff_matrix wasn't properly testing the upper bound
now there are tracks that looks for telomere kmers in the assembly, the short reads, and the long reads
updating the kmer_positions.py script to not include revcomp to allow stranded searches
